title: Cryptid Chronicles: Encounters with Mysterious Creatures Around the Globe

body.raw: "Salutations, fellow cryptid enthusiasts and monster hunters! While I might be Earth's mightiest kaiju, I'm not the only enigmatic creature lurking in the shadows. Join me as I recount my encounters with creatures of the cryptid realm, from Loch Ness leviathans to Bigfoot's booming footsteps.",
body.html: "Salutations, fellow cryptid enthusiasts and monster hunters! While I might be Earth's mightiest kaiju, I'm not the only enigmatic creature lurking in the shadows. Join me as I recount my encounters with creatures of the cryptid realm, from Loch Ness leviathans to Bigfoot's booming footsteps.",
